name: Hiraeth Ascension
description: This is a level I made for my university class. The player takes the role of an imaginary friend, hopping through children's imaginations, trying to find the child they lost. My level is in the imagination of a child who is leaving his family and brother to attend a school far away. The level is symbolic of him growing up and maturing. He's upset to leave, but memories of his brother keep his imagination alive. Ascend into the skies in this puzzle adventure game.
